description.en:
Effortless Decentralized Passive Income. Hold and EARN.
EARN works by applying a 3% fee to each transaction and instantly splitting 1.5% of that fee among all holders of the token. The other 1.5% is burned, making the tokens more scarce over time.

Holders do not need to wait or stake for their fees to be delivered. Fees are awarded by the smart contract and are immediately shown in the holder’s balance.
